name: Specified Waste pipework is Acoustic Lagged
Penetrations through fire cells are fire protected
All joist Brackets or Reinforcement installed if required
Nog's and fixings are installed for WC, WHB, SHW, HWC?
Cold water mains & Hot Water is thermally lagged
FWG Flange is recessed into flooring and installed
Check waste pipes for height and position (flush pipe)
Water tested to 1500kpa and loop not effect lining
Soil and waste piping hydrostatic test ( Flood test )
First Fix completed as required (photos attached)
Fit-off Materials match schedule on plans
No debris in floor wastes or stubs
HWC Tempered to required outlet temp
Flanges installed on all pipework to vermin proof
All soil pipes are connected to sanitary sewer
No crossovers, Hot on left and Cold on Right
All fixtures are silicon-ed down and splash sealed
Shower Hoses are fitted with non returns
Second Fix completed as required (photos attached)
Flood Test in accordance with AS NZS 3500
CWM - Clip Spacing to manufacturer's specs horizontal/ vertical
HWM - Clip spacing to manufacturer's specs horizontal/ vertical
Open ends of riser capped for testing
Pressure/ Bounce test to fusiotherm specs
Visual check (for leaks from valves, tees, saddles, etc)
Flush all lines and strainer including rinnais
Check all valves and connections for leaks
Operate cold water expansion valves / check operation
Check HWC For Correct Valve Installation
Check All Hot/Cold Pipes For Correct Position
Set Bleed air from primary pumps
Set all return thermostatic balancing valves
Test gas for soundness & check working pressure
Water temperature in Hot water cylinders
Hot Water Plant, pumps & tempering valves checklist complete
